thig2.7:1.1: "On the fourteenth day, on the fifteenth day,
thig2.7:1.2: on the eight day of a fortnight,
thig2.7:1.4: well entered in all its eight factors.
thig2.7:2.2: rejoicing at a group of Devas.
thig2.7:2.4: a shaven-head, wrapped in the outer robe,
thig2.7:2.5: I do not pray for the Devas,
thig2.7:2.6: having removed sorrow from the heart."
